entry.title: Ukraine Mounts Counteroffensive to Drive Russians Back From Kyiv, Key Cities
entry.content: Kyiv’s forces appeared to counterattack in the outlying towns of Irpin, Bucha and Hostomel, while Ukraine said it carried out an airstrike on the Kherson airport, which is now a Russian air base.

entry.title: Nearly 1 Million Child Refugees Have Fled Ukraine for Poland
entry.content: Psychologists are working with refugees, leaving no appointments for locals, and government housing for needy Poles is now occupied by Ukrainians.

entry.title: Russia's War on Ukraine Transforms Europe, but Hard Decisions Lie Ahead
entry.content: After a decisive early reaction to Russian President Vladimir Putin’s invasion, European Union leaders are debating deeper changes needed to safeguard the continent.
